refnamediv.refpurpose: Deletes a service entry from the SCM database

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
servicename
The short name of the service.
machine
The optional machine name. If omitted, the local machine will be used.

&reftitle.changelog;
&Version; &Description;
PECL win32service 1.0.0
Throws a ValueError on invalid data in parameters, previously &false; was returned.
PECL win32service 1.0.0
Throws a Win32ServiceException on error, previously a Win32 Error Code was returned.
PECL win32service 1.0.0
The return type is now void, previously it was mixed.
